Body:
Hello everyone,


The first three tabs indicate any new provider additions, changes, or terminations occurring since the previous month's roster.

The remaining tabs are complete listings of providers rendering services under each of our delegated TIN's.



Maryland Family Care, Inc.                      52-2046586

St. Paul Place Specialists, Inc.                    52-1495113

Vascular Specialty Services, Inc.                 52-1995474

Lutherville Hematology and Oncology Services   27-4697590

Teresa Hoffman, MD & Associates            52-2154405

                                                                                                Neurosurgical Specialty Services, LLC         47-3421551



Our IT department as implemented the "secure zip message" there's an expiration date of 30 days, if an email is not open in a timely manner.



Please attempt / try to open the "Monthly Delegated Roster" within 30 days, so that I can be assured that our provider's are being loaded/credentialed in your systems as PAR.



If you have any questions, or if additional information is required, please feel free to call or email me.

I would appreciate confirmation that you have received this roster, and again when all data has been updated.


Thanks,

Vickie Campbell
Manager, Medical Staff Services
410-659-2802 phone
410-332-9789 fax
